item.title: Resistance to this album is futile
item.author: Jack Pearson,Tams Lu,
item.description: Who are the Manic Street Preachers? They’re hailed as indie rock kings. They’re known for a slick bit of politics. Resistance is Futile gives us that, but better. Building off their old classics ‘Motorcycle Emptiness’ and ‘A Design For Life’, this eagerly anticipated album opens with ‘People Give …

item.title: Cory Henry brought the funk back to London last week
item.author: Jack Pearson,
item.description: Hosted at KOKO, the venue’s atmosphere was perpendicular to that of the typical Friday night. An empty smoking area and non-sticky floors paid tribute to the multi-layered theater environment as an ideal place to host a gig (though drinks prices were unfortunately the same as any regular Saturday, …
